query: SELECT id, centre_id, level_name, level_number, is_hidden FROM floor_levels WHERE centre_id = 150000 OR centre_id IN (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Bass Hill%') ORDER BY centre_id, level_number;
